General.Name: Correlate Infrastructure Partners Inc
General.Description: Correlate Infrastructure Partners Inc., a portfolio-scale real estate platform, provides proprietary clean energy assessment and fulfilment solutions for the commercial real estate industry in North America. The company also offers consulting services on acquisitions and project development tools in the commercial solar industry. Its central management platform, a SaaS-based building relationship manager that connects data and solution applications for up to 90% faster energy decisions. The company is headquartered in Shreveport, Louisiana.
General.Address: 220 Travis Street, Shreveport, LA, United States, 71101
